title: The year 2038 problem
description:
What’s the deal with January 19th, 2038? Why remembering Y2K correctly matters.

Featuring
Rose Eveleth (@roseveleth)

Links to resources discussed:
Flash Forward Podcast

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset
